DataElement.preferredName: Document Version Workflow Status Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the state of the document version workflow. EXAMPLE(S): On-hold, Accepted, Rejected, Abstracted, Abstraction Verified, Abstraction not verified.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of work.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of work.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.

The operational aspect of a work procedure: how tasks are structured, who performs them, what their relative order is, how they are synchronized, how information flows to support the tasks and how tasks are being tracked.
A condition or state at a particular time.

Property.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
